heading: HB04905
0: AN ACT AMENDING SECTION 2 AND 3 (B) OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 8794, OTHERWISE, KNOWN AS "AN ACT IMPOSING A MOTOR VEHICLE USER'S CHARGE ON OWNERS OF ALL TYPES OF MOTOR VEHICLES AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES"
principal-authors: DEL ROSARIO, MANUEL MONSOUR III T.
status: Pending with the Committee on PUBLIC WORKS AND HIGHWAYS since 2018-02-05
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB04905
FULL TITLE : AN ACT AMENDING SECTION 2 AND 3 (B) OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 8794, OTHERWISE, KNOWN AS "AN ACT IMPOSING A MOTOR VEHICLE USER'S CHARGE ON OWNERS OF ALL TYPES OF MOTOR VEHICLES AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES"
ABSTRACT : Seeks to amend MVUC to exempt motorcycles for hire with sidecar used as a means of livelihood; Provides further that these motorcycles shall not pay more than three hundred pesos (P300.00)
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : DEL ROSARIO, MANUEL MONSOUR III T.
DATE FILED : 2017-02-01
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON PUBLIC WORKS AND HIGHWAYS ON 2018-02-05
SECONDARILY REFERRED TO THE COMMITTEE(S) ON WAYS AND MEANS
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO PUBLIC WORKS AND HIGHWAYS on 2017-02-08;
